Text:
Nope, spunkster's right, most foreign porn blows. Just because ya'll disagree doesn't make his comment ignorant or trolling, he DID say it was his personal opinion. 

It isn't even the fake moaning that bugs me so much, but the totally fake and completely overblown O-face the girls always make, like their lips are in permanent pucker mode. Seriously, nobody does that during sex, it is distracting and a total dick-wilter.
